string.text: Standard .45 ACP Vector magazine with a capacity of 30 rounds.
Extneded Glock magazine for 9x19 Parabellum cartridges with a capacity of 33 rounds.
.45 ACP Vector drum magazine with a capacity of 45 rounds.
Glock drum magazine for 9x19 Parabellum cartridges with a capacity of 50 rounds.
